subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Shiffrin, an 18-year-old American who has dominated the World Cup slalom and is an Olympic favorite, was raised with a focus on process, not results.
snippet: Shiffrin, an 18-year-old American who has dominated the World Cup slalom and is an Olympic favorite, was raised with a focus on process, not results.
